name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Arrivals
description: This is a repository of arrivals APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Lufthansa
apis.description: Book your flights to Germany, Italy, UK or France online at attractive low fares. Fly via Frankfurt, Munich or Zurich - Lufthansa United States of America

apis.name: Transport for London Unified
apis.description: We are the integrated transport authority responsible for delivering Mayor of London Sadiq Khans strategy and commitments on transport. We run the day-to-day operation of the Capitals public transport network and manage Londons main roads.
